amendment.description: To expand the SkillBridge initiative to include participation by Federal agencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 574 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 574 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5788) To expand the SkillBridge initiative to include participation by Federal agencies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 574 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 574 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 1003.
